trans-unit.source: Represents HTML elements, text, and any other strings in an ASP.NET page that do not require processing on the server.
trans-unit.target: 表示 HTML 元素、文本和 ASP.NET 页中不需要在服务器上处理的其他任何字符串。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET compiles all HTML elements and readable text that do not require server-side processing into instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 编译所有 HTML 元素和不需要到此类的实例的服务器端处理的可读文本。

trans-unit.source: For example, an HTML element that does not contain a `runat="server"` attribute/value pair in its opening tag is compiled into a <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不包含的 HTML 元素`runat="server"`其开始标记中的属性/值对将编译为<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> objects do not maintain view state, so the contents of a <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> object must be recreated on each request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> 对象后不维护视图状态，因此的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>对象必须在每个请求重新创建。

trans-unit.source: Literal controls behave as text holders, meaning that you can extract text from the literal control and remove the literal control from the parent server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> collection through the parent's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 文本控件的行为作为文本持有人，这意味着，你可以从文本控件中提取文本，并从父服务器控件的删除文本控件<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>收集到父级的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when you develop a custom control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> class, make sure your control performs any required preprocessing steps itself, rather than using a call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to accomplish them.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当开发自定义控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>类中，请确保您的控件执行任何所需本身，而不使用调用预处理步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来完成这些操作。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you would do this to improve the response time of your Web application.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，你可以执行此操作来提高 Web 应用程序的响应时间。

trans-unit.source: You can add or remove literal controls from a page or server control programmatically using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加或删除从使用以编程方式将页或服务器控件的文本控件<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，分别。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the overloaded <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.%23ctor%2A> constructor when overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用重载<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.%23ctor%2A>构造函数时重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code adds two new <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> objects and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> Web server control to the current server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 该代码将添加两个新<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>对象和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>Web 服务器控件到当前服务器控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> class that contains a literal string to be rendered on the requested ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> 类的新实例，该类包含要在请求的 ASP.NET 页上呈现的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a class, `CustLiteralControlClass`, that extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个类， `CustLiteralControlClass`，扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>类。

trans-unit.source: It creates an instance of the class named `myLiteralControlClass1` by using the constructor that does not specify the text of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> object.
trans-unit.target: 它将创建名为的类实例`myLiteralControlClass1`使用构造函数没有指定的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>对象。

trans-unit.source: After the object is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.Text%2A> property is used to set the text that it contains.
trans-unit.target: 在创建对象后，<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.Text%2A>属性用于设置它所包含的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to be rendered on the requested Web page.
trans-unit.target: 要在请求的网页上呈现的文本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> class with the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的文本初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates two instances of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> class using the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建两个实例<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>类使用<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The two instances render opening and closing tags for an H3 HTML element, and include the text to display within the H3 tags.
trans-unit.target: 两个实例呈现 H3 HTML 元素，开始和结束标记，并且包括要显示在 H3 标记内的文本。

trans-unit.source: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> object for the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> 类的当前实例创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> for the current control.
trans-unit.target: 当前控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> objects contain only text and no child server controls.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>对象包含文本和任何子服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: If you want to change this behavior, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要更改此行为，必须重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.CreateControlCollection%2A> method to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> class rather than an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例替代<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.CreateControlCollection%2A>方法创建的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>类而不是实例<xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that renders the content of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> to the requesting client.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 的内容呈现给请求客户端的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the content of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> object to the ASP.NET page.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> 对象的内容写入 ASP.NET 页。

trans-unit.source: When you create a custom server control and want to render specific HTML or text to a client, you can improve the performance of the control by passing the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.Text%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method rather than calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.Render%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建自定义服务器控件和想要将特定的 HTML 或文本呈现给客户端时，可以通过传递的值来提高性能的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.Text%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，而不是调用<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.Render%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text content of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl" /> 对象的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the text content of the literal control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示文本控件的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a class, `CustLiteralControlClass`, that extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个类， `CustLiteralControlClass`，扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>类。

trans-unit.source: It creates an instance of the class named `myLiteralControlClass1` by using the constructor that does not specify the text of the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl> object.
trans-unit.target: 它将创建名为的类实例`myLiteralControlClass1`使用构造函数没有指定的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl>对象。

trans-unit.source: After the object is created, the <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.Text%2A> property is used to set the text that it contains.
trans-unit.target: 在创建对象后，<xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl.Text%2A>属性用于设置它所包含的文本。
